messages.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: Please provide a list of the top 50 universities in the QS 2026 World University Rankings, including each university’s rank, university name, founding year, country, and specific address of its main campus.

Please organize the results in one Markdown table with the following columns:
rank, university name, founding year, country, specific address

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.?

<think>
I need the list of top 50 universities in the QS 2026 World University Rankings along with their details. I'll start searching for this information.
</think>
<search> top 50 universities in the QS 2026 World University Rankings </search>

Search query: top 50 universities in the QS 2026 World University Rankings
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.topuniversities.com/world-university-rankings):
QS World University Rankings 2026: Top Global Universities 1 · 100. Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) · Cambridge, United States ; 2 · 99.4. Imperial College London · London, United Kingdom ; 3 · 98.9.

[Doc 2](https://www.timeshighereducation.com/world-university-rankings/latest/world-ranking):
World University Rankings 2026 | Times Higher Education (THE) Explore the 2026 World University Rankings by Times Higher Education. Compare over 2000 top universities and discover this year's leading institutions.

[Doc 3](https://www.qs.com/rankings-performance):
QS World University Rankings and performance | Learn more The QS World University Rankings offers impartial assessments of institutions, helping to drive performance and assist students in making informed ...

The direct link to the specific ranking data for 2026 isn't readily available from these snippets. I need to search specifically for the top 50 universities in the QS 2026 ranking.
<search> top 50 universities in the QS 2026 ranking </search>

Search query: top 50 universities in the QS 2026 ranking
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.topuniversities.com/world-university-rankings):

[Doc 3](https://www.qs.com/rankings-performance):
QS World University Rankings and performance | Learn more The QS World University Rankings offers impartial assessments of institutions, helping to drive performance and assist students in making informed ...

It seems like there's an issue with immediate access to the top 50 universities in the QS 2026 ranking. Let's go directly to the QS website which is a primary source for such rankings:

<search> QS Top 50 Universities 2026 </search>

Search query: QS Top 50 Universities 2026
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.topuniversities.com/world-university-rankings):
QS World University Rankings 2026: Top Global Universities 1 · 100. Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) · Cambridge, United States ; 2 · 99.4. Imperial College London · London, United Kingdom ; 3 · 98.9.

[Doc 2](https://www.usnews.com/education/best-global-universities/rankings):
2025-2026 Best Global Universities Rankings Here are the best global universities · Harvard University · Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) · Stanford University · University of Oxford · University of ...

[Doc 3](https://www.qs.com/rankings-performance):
QS World University Rankings and performance | Learn more Rankings calendar ; QS World University Rankings: Europe 2026, 21 Jan 26, 10:00 GMT ; QS World University Rankings: Sub-Saharan Africa 2026, 12 Feb 26, 10:00 GMT.

Given that direct access to the ranking data isn't provided, I'll assume the top ranking universities have not changed drastically and use current QS rankings for the closest approximation. I will now fetch current top universities and approximate their founding years based on general knowledge.
</think>
<search> current top 50 universities in QS ranking </search>

Search query: current top 50 universities in QS ranking
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.topuniversities.com/university-rankings):
QS Universities Rankings - Top Global Universities & Colleges Explore global leading institutions by region, subject & location ranked as per 6 ranking indicators by QS World University Rankings.

[Doc 2](https://www.topuniversities.com/world-university-rankings):
QS World University Rankings 2026: Top Global Universities 1 · 100. Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) · Cambridge, United States ; 2 · 99.4. Imperial College London · London, United Kingdom ; 3 · 98.9.

[Doc 3](https://www.topuniversities.com/qs-world-university-rankings):
QS World University Rankings: Top global universities 1 Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) · 2 Imperial College London · 3 Stanford University.

Based on the current ranking data, MIT has been consistently ranked first, and the top 50 universities should closely mirror those at the top of the most recent QS ranking list.

<search> MIT founding year </search>

Search query: MIT founding year
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massachusetts_Institute_of_Technology):
Massachusetts Institute of Technology - Wikipedia Established in 1861, MIT has played a significant role in the development of many areas of modern technology and science.

[Doc 2](https://mitadmissions.org/discover/about-mit/a-brief-history-of-mit/):
A brief history of MIT - MIT Admissions In 1865, the founding of MIT established a new kind of independent educational institution relevant to an increasingly industrialized America.

[Doc 3](https://facts.mit.edu/origins/):
Origins - MIT Facts MIT is independent, coeducational, and privately endowed. The Institute admitted its first students in 1865, four years after the approval of its founding ...
